price: Obi a ͻtwe ne ho firi Ahummͻborͻ hene no nkaekaeε ho no, Yεde no ma ͻbonsam ma ͻfa no yͻnkoͻ.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡشُ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُۥ شَيۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿshu ʿan dhik'ri al-raḥmāni nuqayyiḍ lahu shayṭānan fahuwa lahu qarīnun
